Text.Value: Kled heard that salt can stop hag magic?
Kled is sorry.
And leave our leader, the one who saved us, behind? No - my honour won't allow it.
Gods give me strength - get a hold of yourself!
The doll is just the beginning - we need to go.
THERE! I SEE THE DOLL!
Faith does little good against a hag.
Helm is on our side - have faith.
Paranoia is just the beginning, you know.
We may as well paint targets on our foreheads and call out for the hag.
You are not a half-wit - you're clever and valiant. And I am glad to call you friend.
It's vanished - damn this dance. The hag is toying with us.
And have the doll follow us? No - I'll not endanger innocents.
Grab it, now!
You're the cleric - any ideas?
The doll keeps teleporting - we need to find a way to stop it.
Kled is sorry.
The hag could arrive at any moment - we need to go.
Bloody lay off, dragonborn. We've a hag after us - we don't need your bellyaching, too.
Kled hates the doll. Kled wants it gone.
What was that? Kled heard a noise!
Calm down, mate. The cleric has this place secured.
That's a childish superstition, you half-wit.

Synopsis: Ambient group AD that happens between hag survivros before they spot any of the party members for the first time
